page.title: 09LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: { PARISH LIFE, RELIGION, {CHURCHES(HAMPTON LOVETT) The rector of this parish is Rev.Atty who has been here since 1973.He has 4 churches to look after including Hampton Lovett which has a population of 200 people.He holds 1 service every Sunday and his congregation varies between 8_25 people.During 1985 he has conducted 4 Baptisms,1Marriage and 2 Burials.The major problems during 1985 have been funding repairs for the leaking roof and some vandalism.In order to discourage vandalism the church is now locked at all times.The upkeep of the church is funded by collections,donations and fund raising.This year on Midsummer's night a garden party was held in the village raising Â£400 for the church.
